00062 class SIM_API cNEDValue
00063 {
00064     friend class cDynamicExpression;
00065   public:
00069     // Note: char codes need to be present and be consistent with cNEDFunction::getArgTypes()!
00070     enum Type {UNDEF=0, BOOL='B', DBL='D', STR='S', XML='X'} type;
00071 
00072   private:
00073     bool bl;
00074     double dbl;
00075     const char *dblunit; // string constants or pooled strings; may be NULL
00076     std::string s;
00077     cXMLElement *xml;
00078 
00079   private:
00080 #ifdef NDEBUG
00081     void assertType(Type) const {}
00082 #else
00083     void assertType(Type t) const {if (type!=t) cannotCastError(t);}
00084 #endif
00085     void cannotCastError(Type t) const;
00086 
00087   public:
00090     cNEDValue()  {type=UNDEF;}
00091     cNEDValue(bool b)  {set(b);}
00092     cNEDValue(long l)  {set(l);}
00093     cNEDValue(double d)  {set(d);}
00094     cNEDValue(double d, const char *unit)  {set(d,unit);}
00095     cNEDValue(const char *s)  {set(s);}
00096     cNEDValue(const std::string& s)  {set(s);}
00097     cNEDValue(cXMLElement *x)  {set(x);}
00098     cNEDValue(const cPar& par) {set(par);}
00100 
00104     void operator=(const cNEDValue& other);
00105 
00111     Type getType() const  {return type;}
00112 
00116     static const char *getTypeName(Type t);
00117 
00121     bool isNumeric() const {return type==DBL;}
00122 
00126     bool isSet() const  {return type!=UNDEF;}
00127 
00131     std::string str() const;
00132 
00139     static double convertUnit(double d, const char *unit, const char *targetUnit);
00140 
00149     static const char *getPooled(const char *s);
00151 
00154 
00158     void set(bool b) {type=BOOL; bl=b;}
00159 
00163     void set(long l) {type=DBL; dbl=l; dblunit=NULL;}
00164 
00170     void set(double d, const char *unit=NULL) {type=DBL; dbl=d; dblunit=unit;}
00171 
00176     void setPreservingUnit(double d) {assertType(DBL); dbl=d;}
00177 
00184     void setUnit(const char *unit) {assertType(DBL); dblunit=unit;}
00185 
00195     void convertTo(const char *unit);
00196 
00201     void set(const char *s) {type=STR; this->s=s?s:"";}
00202 
00206     void set(const std::string& s) {type=STR; this->s=s;}
00207 
00211     void set(cXMLElement *x) {type=XML; xml=x;}
00212 
00216     void set(const cPar& par);
00218 
00221 
00225     bool boolValue() const {assertType(BOOL); return bl;}
00226 
00230     long longValue() const {assertType(DBL); return (long)dbl;}
00231 
00235     double doubleValue() const {assertType(DBL); return dbl;}
00236 
00242     double doubleValueInUnit(const char *unit) const {return convertUnit(dbl, dblunit, unit);}
00243 
00248     const char *getUnit() const {assertType(DBL); return dblunit;}
00249 
00253     const char *stringValue() const {assertType(STR); return s.c_str();}
00254 
00258     const std::string& stdstringValue() const {assertType(STR); return s;}
00259 
00263     cXMLElement *xmlValue() const {assertType(XML); return xml;}
00265 
00268 
00272     cNEDValue& operator=(bool b)  {set(b); return *this;}
00273 
00277     cNEDValue& operator=(char c)  {set((long)c); return *this;}
00278 
00282     cNEDValue& operator=(unsigned char c)  {set((long)c); return *this;}
00283 
00287     cNEDValue& operator=(int i)  {set((long)i); return *this;}
00288 
00292     cNEDValue& operator=(unsigned int i)  {set((long)i); return *this;}
00293 
00297     cNEDValue& operator=(short i)  {set((long)i); return *this;}
00298 
00302     cNEDValue& operator=(unsigned short i)  {set((long)i); return *this;}
00303 
00307     cNEDValue& operator=(long l)  {set(l); return *this;}
00308 
00312     cNEDValue& operator=(unsigned long l) {set((long)l); return *this;}
00313 
00317     cNEDValue& operator=(double d)  {set(d); return *this;}
00318 
00322     cNEDValue& operator=(long double d)  {set((double)d); return *this;}
00323 
00327     cNEDValue& operator=(const char *s)  {set(s); return *this;}
00328 
00332     cNEDValue& operator=(const std::string& s)  {set(s); return *this;}
00333 
00337     cNEDValue& operator=(cXMLElement *node)  {set(node); return *this;}
00338 
00342     cNEDValue& operator=(const cPar& par)  {set(par); return *this;}
00343 
00347     operator bool() const  {return boolValue();}
00348 
00353     operator char() const  {return (char)longValue();}
00354 
00359     operator unsigned char() const  {return (unsigned char)longValue();}
00360 
00365     operator int() const  {return (int)longValue();}
00366 
00371     operator unsigned int() const  {return (unsigned int)longValue();}
00372 
00377     operator short() const  {return (short)longValue();}
00378 
00383     operator unsigned short() const  {return (unsigned short)longValue();}
00384 
00388     operator long() const  {return longValue();}
00389 
00394     operator unsigned long() const  {return longValue();}
00395 
00399     operator double() const  {return doubleValue();}
00400 
00405     operator long double() const  {return doubleValue();}
00406 
00410     operator const char *() const  {return stringValue();}
00411 
00415     operator std::string() const  {return stdstringValue();}
00416 
00421     operator cXMLElement *() const  {return xmlValue();}
00423 };
